TASK: Format text as bold/italic
DOMAIN: office

STEPS:
1. Open LibreOffice Writer application
   REASONING: Need to launch a word processing application to work with text formatting
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.02, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Start menu to appear
   REASONING: Allow time for the Start menu interface to fully load
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

3. Type application name to search
   REASONING: Quickly locate LibreOffice Writer through search functionality
   ACTION: TYPE("libreoffice writer")

4. Wait for search results
   REASONING: Allow search to complete and display matching applications
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

5. Click on LibreOffice Writer from results
   REASONING: Launch the application to begin working with documents
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.35)

6. Wait for application to fully load
   REASONING: Ensure the application window and interface are completely ready
   ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

7. Type sample text to format
   REASONING: Need text content to apply formatting to
   ACTION: TYPE("This text will be formatted as bold and italic")

8. Select all the typed text
   REASONING: Must select text before applying formatting options
   ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "a")

9. Wait for text selection
   REASONING: Ensure text is fully selected before applying formatting
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

10. Apply bold formatting
    REASONING: Make the selected text bold using keyboard shortcut
    ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "b")

11. Wait for bold formatting to apply
    REASONING: Allow the formatting change to be processed and rendered
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

12. Apply italic formatting while text is still selected
    REASONING: Add italic styling in addition to bold to achieve bold/italic combination
    ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "i")

13. Wait for italic formatting to apply
    REASONING: Ensure both bold and italic formatting are fully rendered
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

14. Click elsewhere to deselect text and view result
    REASONING: Deselecting allows clear visualization of the applied formatting
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.6)

15. Task completed successfully
    REASONING: Text has been formatted with both bold and italic styling as required
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: The text "This text will be formatted as bold and italic" should appear in LibreOffice Writer with both bold and italic formatting applied, displaying as emphasized text that is both heavier in weight and slanted.
